Title: PreSti - The Neuroscience Stimuli Presentation Software
Description: PreSti is stimuli delivery and experimental control program for neuroscience developed in C#, based on DirecX and NShapes framework.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
PreSti is stimuli delivery and experimental control program for neuroscience developed in C#, based on DirecX and NShapes framework.

Key features:
  • very simple way of making testing scenarios using graphs instead of a programming language.
  • extensibility - it is possible to add advanced features and stimuli that can be used in graphical interface.
  • open source license.
